name: Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70 Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY  Polka Dot Black
description: Converse tapped Commes des Garçons once again to create the Comme des Garçons x Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Low 'Polka Dot.' The shoe's upper sports a canvas construction in black, accented by white polka dots throughout the design and the usual heart logo on the side wall. Contrast stitching emerges throughout, supported by a rubber toe cap and vulcanized rubber sole unit underfoot, finished in off-white.
